verbs.description: [ARG1: i] [ARGM-ADV: just] [V: upgraded] [ARG2: to the iphone xs max] and this is the only case i trust to protect my phone the otterbox statement series case is a durable and elegant choice for the iphone xs and xs max it uses a rubber bezel clear polycarbonate and leather case iphone apple
